system.requirements:
Tier 2: Disturbing Voice, Intimidate +10
Aptitudes: Nurgle
system.effect: The Character may sing an unnatural droning dirge that brings discomfort to those around them, requiring a Half Action each round to Maintain. All creatures within 30m that can hear them must make a +0 Willpower Test each round or suffer -10 on their next roll. If a creature passes the test, they are immune to the dirge's effects for the remainder of the encounter.
